content: <?xml version="1.0" ?> <licenseClass id="pic_cc_by"><field id="creator"><label>Attribute work to name</label><description>The name of the creator of the work</description></field><field id="workurl"><label>Attribute work to URL</label><description>The URL of the work</description></field><field id="title"><label>Title of Work</label><description>The title of the work</description></field><field id="holder"><label>Holder</label><description>The name of the work holder</description></field><field id="year"><label>Year</label><description>The year in which the work was produced</description></field><field id="type"><label>Format of Work</label><description>The format of the work</description></field><field id="outputType"><description>The format of the output</description><label>License Output format</label><label>XML having License HTML and RDF</label><label>License HTML ONLY</label></field><field id="description"><label>Description</label><description>A brief description of the work</description></field></licenseClass>
